This Privacy Policy was last updated on March 16, 2020

This Privacy Policy applies to the Site (https://www.mile.cloud/) and it governs how CloudMile Inc. (hereinafter referred to as “CloudMile”) collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users (“Users”).

Please read this policy carefully to safeguard your rights and interests when browsing the CloudMile website or utilizing the services provided by CloudMile. If you disagree with any parts of this policy, please discontinue use of this website and CloudMile services immediately. By continuing to use this website and CloudMile services, you agree to all the relevant regulations set forth in this Policy.
Personal Data is information about you t:
Personal Data is information about you that is personally identifiable, such as your name, username, password, address, email address, phone number, which is not otherwise publicly available. (“Personal Data”) We collect Personal Data to provide better services to Users.

Users may be asked for Personal Data, including without limitation, when Users visit our Site and in connection with other activities, services, features or resources made available on our Site. Users may, however, visit our Site anonymously. We will collect Personal Data from Users only if they voluntarily submit such information to us. In the event that Users refuse to provide Personal Data, please note that it may prevent Users from engaging in certain Site-related activities.
We may collect non-personally identifiab: We may collect non-personally identifiable data about Users in the course of the interaction with our Site. Non-personally identifiable data is data that is not personally identifiable about the Users, including without limitation User’s browser name, the type of computer and technical information about User’s means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the internet service providers utilized and other similar information.
Certain information may also be collecte: Certain information may also be collected, such as your Internet protocol address, device event information including but not limited to browser type, crashes, system activity and other server log information. Our Site may use “cookies” to enhance User experience. User's web browser places cookies on their hard drive for record-keeping purposes and sometimes to track information about them. User may disable cookies on their web browser or set the browser to alert you when cookies are being sent. In the event that the web browser is set to refuse cookies, please note that some parts of the Site may not function properly.
How We Process and Use Collected Persona: How We Process and Use Collected Personal Data
Cloudmile may process and use__: Cloudmile may process and use User’s Personal Data by mail, phone call and other reasonable legal means for the following purposes (“Purposes”) within the territories and during the period necessary to carry out the Purposes:
In the event that Users send to us__: In the event that Users send to us any comments or inquires on the Site, we will reply to such Users via the contact information provided by Users.
We may use information in the aggregate: We may use information in the aggregate to understand how our Users as a group use the services and resources provided on our Site.
To send newsletters and marketing materi: To send newsletters and marketing materials upon subscription
If User subscribes our newsletter on__: If User subscribes our newsletter on the Site, we will send emails to the subscribers for information related to our Company, such as occasional company news, upcoming events, updates, related product or service information. Detailed instructions to unsubscribe the newsletter are provided at the bottom of such email. User may unsubscribe such newsletter at any time. Upon receiving User’s request to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, we will immediately remove User’s email address from our mailing list and stop sending future emails to such User.
To administer any features on the Site: To administer any features on the Site
If Users enter into a sweepstak__: If Users enter into a sweepstake, contest, survey, promotion or activities on the Site, we may use the information provided by Users to administer such features.
We adopt appropriate data collection__: We adopt appropriate data collection, storage and processing practices and information security measures to guard against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction of your Personal Data, transaction information and data processed and stored on our Site.
We will not share Personal Data__: We will not share Personal Data outside of us without your consent.
We may use third-party service providers: We may use third-party service providers to help us operate our business and the Site or administer activities on our behalf, such as sending out newsletters or surveys. We may share your information with these third parties for those limited purposes, based on our instructions, and in compliance with this policy and any other appropriate confidentiality and security measures.
We may share generic aggregated demograp: We may share generic aggregated demographic information with our business partners, trusted affiliates and advertisers for the foregoing purposes.
Advertisements may appear on our product: Advertisements may appear on our products and services that are delivered to Users by third-party advertisers, who may set cookies. These cookies allow the advertiser’s server to recognize your computer each time they send you an online advertisement and to compile non-Personal Data about you or whoever use your computer. This information allows advertisers to, among other purposes, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you. This Privacy Policy does not cover the use of cookies or any practices by such advertisers. You have a number of options to control or limit how we and third-party use cookies and similar technologies, including for advertising.
The Site may contain links to third-part: The Site may contain links to third-party websites, products, and services. Our products and services may also use or offer products or services from third parties. This Privacy Policy does not apply to the practices of those third parties. Users are encouraged to review the privacy policies of those third parties.
We regularly review our Privacy Policy a: We regularly review our Privacy Policy and our compliance therewith. Our Privacy Policy may change from time to time. We will update our Privacy Policy on this page of our Site if there may be any changes and a notice will be posted along with the update in case of any material change. We encourage Users to frequently check this page for any changes. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
This online Privacy Policy applies only: This online Privacy Policy applies only to information collected through the Site, all on-line products and services and not to information collected offline.
With respect to your Personal Data provi: With respect to your Personal Data provided to us, you may make the following request through contacting Cloudmile’s Customer Service at service@mile.cloud at any time:
to make an inquiry of and to review your: to make an inquiry of and to review your personal data;
to request a copy of your personal data: to request a copy of your personal data;
to supplement or correct your personal d: to supplement or correct your personal data;
to demand the cessation of the collectio: to demand the cessation of the collection, processing or use of your personal data; and
To ensure the security of your informati: To ensure the security of your information and the enforcement of the Privacy Policy, we communicate our policies and regulations and administer supervision to our employees
If you have any questions about this Pri: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, the data processing, or the operation of this Site, please contact us at:
